overview: There is a type of tent used by many desert dwellers known as a yurt. The clan of Arab men that you will be introduced to in this series of amazing scenes from Alexander Pictures will make you want to erect a tent of your own. It’s all that you would expect in one of Alexander’s Arab-themed films. Sweet muscles, beautiful bodies, and gorgeous cocks abound. Do your best to waste not even a drop of your own liquid until the end of the movie. Don’t worry if you aren’t able to make it through. Most couldn’t!
title: Arabian Desert Camps
